Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Catchup on important emails in Copilot Chat
Description:
Copilot Chat helps you stay on top of your inbox by highlighting important and actionable emails such as messages from your manager, leadership, top collaborators, or emails containing tasks when you use prompts like “What’s hot in my inbox?” or “What were the important emails from last week?”
GA date: July CY2025
